title: Agile Retrospectives
subtitle: Product Design
greetingText: Agile Retrospectives is an add-on for Jira and Confluence to run interactive retrospectives sessions, create action items and keep history of your past sessions.
detailsText: Work within a remote team can be challenging, that an opportunity area we found. Our goal itâ€™s to build an app that could help remote teams on their retrospectives sessions in an easy way.
contributionList: Mockup design: provide the Invision prototype and Sketch files
